dmca.title: Copyright Infringement and Request for Removal (05_19_2006_TJNR01)
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: FelixFlow [mailto:felix@felixflow.com] 
Posted At: Friday, May 19, 2006 3:16 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Infringement and Request for Removal
(05_19_2006_TJNR01)
Subject: Copyright Infringement and Request for Removal
(05_19_2006_TJNR01)


To: 

George Poletes, Corporate Counsel

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Webmaster, Legal Department
"ThatsJustNotRight.com"
 

*        NOTICE of COPYRIGHT-TRADEMARK, or RIGHT of PUBLICITY
INFRINGEMENT 
*        INFRINGEMENT and REQUEST FOR REMOVAL pursuant to 17 USC 512

 

 

 

May 19, 2006

 

 

 

Flownation, Inc.

PO Box 348528

Sacramento, CA  95834-8528

USA

felix@felixflow.com

www.KariSweets.com

 

 

 

Dear Sirs/Mesdames:



YOU ARE HEREBY NOTIFIED of infringement pursuant to the Digital
Millennium
Copyright Act 17 USC 512.  Pursuant thereto you are hereby given notice
that the undersigned has authority to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right, that is, copyrights of FlowNation, Inc. operating
under its trade name "KariSweets.com". The information set forth herein
is believed to be accurate pursuant to a good faith belief that the use
of
the material in the matter complained of is not authorized by my client,
its agent or under the applicable law.

The infringement material is identified as being located on the World
Wide
Web at:

 

http://thatsjustnotright.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=16191

 

http://thatsjustnotright.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=10159

 

http://thatsjustnotright.com/forum/index.php?s=d7fe8967b99a583b23eb8a750
460b82b&showtopic=16191&st=820#

 

http://thatsjustnotright.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=16191&st=800#

 

 

copyright infringement by user "Antone"
http://thatsjustnotright.com/forum/index.php?showuser=16255

 

 

 

Pursuant to the DCMA you are required to expeditiously remove, or
disable
access to, the infringing material, and notify the subscriber of such
removal or disablement.  Pursuant to 17 USC 512(g)(1) an internet
service
provider (ISP) that has registered with the copyright office the name
and
contact information of the person to receive infringement notices,
enjoys
immunity from liability for the removal or disablement of infringing
content, so long as additional safe guards as provided by statute.
Please
forward this notice to your corporate legal department, general counsel,
or other legal counsel immediately for action and direct all responses
to
the attention of the writer at the contact information provided below.

I thank you for your immediate attention to this notice and request for
removal of the infringing material forthwith.

Yours truly,

L. Felix 

Flownation, Inc.

www.KariSweets.com
